hero.title: Hero Section
hero.content: Alexander Übelhör is a creative who codes, freelancing as a web developer and graphic designer. Based in Stockholm, with one foot in Italy.

about.title: About
about.content:
Alexander Übelhör, Graphic Designer with coding skills and background in motion graphics, 3D animation.

With a BA in Graphic Design and freelance experience, I’ve worked across formats—from posters and digital layouts to animated visuals and short-form video content. Currently, I’m expanding my skill set through the Technigo Web Development bootcamp, deepening my knowledge of front-end and full-stack development.

Curious by nature, I enjoy exploring new tools and creative methods that strengthen my core practice in design and development. Whether working solo or as part of a team, I try to bring adaptability, intention, and a genuine passion for visual arts and technology to every project.

I'm interested in contemporary culture, art, and new media, and I also enjoy creatively exploring the intersections between them. In addition to applied work I continue a practice of personal and collaborative visual art and moving image work.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: I’m always open to new projects and collaborations. If you have something in mind—or just want to connect—feel free to reach out. I’m happy to share my graphic design portfolio and a more detailed CV upon request.
